VIEWS_SPEC.VIEW_TEXT: (CHANNEL_ID,CHANNEL_NAME,CHANNEL_TYPE_DISP,SOURCE_ID,SOURCE_STATUS,SOURCE_TYPE_DISP,INFOLET_NAME,NOTIFY_USERS,CHANNEL_ACTIVE_DISP,EDIT_URL,CHANNEL_DESCRIPTION,SERVER_ADD_URL,SCR_USER_NAME,EMAIL_FROM,KEYWORDS,SOURCE_DESCRIPTION,SERVER_PARAMETERS,USER_ID,PID,CUST_COL1,CUST_COL2,CUST_COL3,CUST_COL4,CUST_COL5) AS SELECT cnlmaster.channel_id, cnlmaster.channel_name, (SELECT ms_apps_utilities.get_display_value (users.enterprise_id, 'MS RGA Channel Type', cnlmaster.channel_type ) FROM DUAL) AS channel_type_disp, details.source_id, (SELECT ms_apps_utilities.get_display_value (users.enterprise_id, 'MS RGA Channel Status', details.active ) FROM DUAL) AS source_status, (SELECT ms_apps_utilities.get_display_value (users.enterprise_id, 'MS RGA Channel Source Type', details.source_type ) FROM DUAL) AS source_type_disp, DECODE (cnlmaster.channel_type, '1', 'N/A', cnlmaster.infolet_name ) AS infolet_name, DECODE (cnlmaster.channel_type, '1', 'N/A', (SELECT ms_concat (ms_apps_utilities.get_user_full_name (a.user_id) ) FROM ms_rga_channel_notify_users a WHERE channel_id = cnlmaster.channel_id) ) AS notify_users, (SELECT ms_apps_utilities.get_display_value (users.enterprise_id, 'MS RGA Channel Status', cnlmaster.active ) FROM DUAL) AS channel_active_disp, ms_apps_utilities.get_edit_url (ms_apps_utilities.get_infolet_id ('MS RGA CREATE CHANNEL'), cnlmaster.pid ) edit_url, cnlmaster.channel_description, details.server_add_url, details.scr_user_name, details.email_from, details.keywords, details.source_description, details.server_parameters, user_id, pid, (select ms_rga_utilities.get_user_name(user_id) from dual) AS cust_col1, NULL AS cust_col2, NULL AS cust_col3, NULL AS cust_col4, NULL AS cust_col5 FROM ms_rga_channel_master cnlmaster, ms_rga_channel_details details, si_users_t users WHERE cnlmaster.channel_id = details.channel_id AND cnlmaster.created_by = users.user_id AND cnlmaster.active = details.active AND cnlmaster.channel_id IN (SELECT request.channel_id FROM ms_rga_subscription_request request )
